title: Don't Be a Complainer
itunes:title: Don't Be a Complainer
description:
It’s easy to notice what’s wrong in a situation and what could be improved. But when we complain, we give life to negative thoughts and limit our perspective. To create change in our lives, we have to approach God with thanksgiving. Let's choose today to live with hearts full of gratitude! Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
